class_notes: Enrollment is limited to students in the QTM MS program until the August add/drop/swap period. At that time, requests for permission should be sent to the instructor, copying Graduate Program Coordinator Ria Buford (ria.buford@emory.edu).
course_description: Introduces students to the procedures for regression analysis for descriptive and causal inference and applied, and formal foundations for regression.
sections: Class Nbr: 2140, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: A. Ananth, Status: Open
